mapper.select: SELECT id,name FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiType
SELECT a.id,a.name,b.id partnerId,b.name partnerName FROM qyfinance.finance_ApiVendor a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwPartner b ON a.partnerId=b.id
SELECT id,name FROM qyfinance.bkvwPartner
SELECT companyId,companyName,partnerId,partnerName FROM qyfinance.bkvw_api_CustomerCompanyPartner

SELECT aaa.apiId,aaa.totleCount,aaa.failCount, bbb.fc,bbb.ts,bbb.apiTypeId,bbb.apiTypeName,bbb.vendorId,bbb.vendorName,bbb.partnerId,bbb.partnerName, bbb.mobileOperatorId,bbb.mobileOperatorName FROM ( SELECT success.apiId, ifnull(success.successCount,0) successCount, ifnull(fail.failCount,0) failCount, ifnull(success.successCount,0)+ifnull(fail.failCount,0) totleCount FROM ( SELECT a.apiId,ifnull(count(b.id),0) successCount FROM ( SELECT aa.apiId FROM qydata.ApiBan aa LEFT JOIN qydata.Api bb ON aa.apiId = bb.id WHERE bb.status = 0 ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog b ON a.apiId = b.apiId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiResponseLog c ON b.id = c.requestLogId WHERE c.createTime >= #{time} AND c.ok = 1 GROUP BY a.apiId ) success LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.apiId,ifnull(count(b.id),0) failCount FROM ( SELECT aa.apiId FROM qydata.ApiBan aa LEFT JOIN qydata.Api bb ON aa.apiId = bb.id WHERE bb.status = 0 ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog b ON a.apiId = b.apiId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiResponseLog c ON b.id = c.requestLogId WHERE c.createTime >= #{time} AND c.ok = 0 GROUP BY a.apiId ) fail ON success.apiId = fail.apiId ) aaa INNER JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiBan bbb ON aaa.apiId = bbb.apiId
SELECT a.id,a.apiId,a.price,a.timeForce,a.timeDead FROM qyfinance.ApiPriceChanceLog a WHERE a.apiId = #{param} AND a.timeDead IS NULL
SELECT a.apiId,a.apiTypeId,a.apiTypeName,a.vendorId,a.vendorName,a.mobileOperatorId,a.mobileOperatorName FROM qyfinance.bkvw_api_ApiTypeVendorPartner a
SELECT CONCAT_WS('-',a.apiTypeId,a.subTypeId) id, CONCAT_WS('--',a.apiTypeName,a.subTypeName) name FROM qyfinance.bkvwCompanyApi a WHERE a.companyId = #{param}
SELECT id FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi WHERE id = #{param} AND status != 0
SELECT id,apiTypeId,cost,status FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi WHERE apiTypeId = #{param2} AND id != #{param1} AND status = 0
SELECT b.ok,b.resTime FROM qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog a INNER JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiResponseLog b ON a.id = b.requestLogId WHERE a.apiId = #{param1} AND a.createTime >= #{param2}
SELECT id FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi WHERE apiTypeId = #{param} AND status = 0 AND cost = ( SELECT min(cost) FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi WHERE apiTypeId = #{param} AND status = 0 )

SELECT a.id,a.rApiId,a.tApiId,a.ok,a.statusCode,b.name statusName,a.createTime FROM qyfinance.RecoverProbLog a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.RecoverProbLogMessage b ON a.statusCode = b.id WHERE a.rApiId = #{param} ORDER BY a.createTime DESC limit 0,1
